reviewText: I didn't realize I purchased the series in German and the 3rd party vendor would not exchange them for an English version, because I purchased them in Sept. as a Christmas gift
It was sent in GERMAN & you have to buy a special DVD player to use it -WORST purchase ever
Be careful , DVD was from Germany, doesn't work on a normal DVD player , now I need to buy a special player .
I didn't realize that the tapes were in German.
Yes, it looks okay. It does not say anywhere it is in Dutch. Will not play on standard DVD player. None of the writing is in English. I was not very happy.
Didn't say anywhere that this was IN GERMAN. I can't resell and I can't watch. Waste of money.

LOVE THESE GIRLS!!!
I could sit for hours watching them.

You can watch this set in ENGLISH.  You MUST HAVE an All Region DVD player.  Once you load each disc you are
"prompted" to pick a language before you are taken to the main menu.  The notes and episode descriptions are in German, but you can
watch all 7 seasons in English.  I have this set and watched some episodes this morning.
this series is german language and not English according to packaging want return or exchange for English language one
